title: Paul's Vengeance
description: This is my birth yet also my death.

post.title: HTTP Filter
post.body: A HTTP Filter written by Java was completed, but not good enough.

post.title: Looking for a way to build my own DNS server
post.body:
Due to some reasons I need to build my own DNS server, seems like I could use two VPS with dnsmasq to meet my need (as below)

me --> VPS(inside country) --> VPS(outside country) --> OpenDNS(or else).

may try it later.
